DOC.brief_summary: Phase I clinical study to evaluate DW1029M influence the pharmacokinetic profiles of Metformin after oral administration in healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Profiles of Metformin With DW1029M
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized, open-label, multiple-dose, crossover phase I clinical study to evaluate DW1029M influence the pharmacokinetic profiles of Metformin after oral administration in healthy male volunteer
